tweets.text: Greed sums it up. Money over public health. Shame on you @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe  #stopthestink #MentalHealthAwarenessWeek https://t.co/cTTlJ2UGBB

@davemh72 @HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe You definitely aren't the only one. When I take flowers to the cemetery to put on my granddad's grave, I just want to be sick by the smell. It makes me feel bad for my granddad resting next to that poison. I don't know how you guys stay so strong living next to it.

@HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe Absolutely heartbreaking. How on Earth are the EA (@EnvagencyMids @ClareDinnisEA ) letting those cowboys get away with this? üò¢üò¢ #StopTheStink
@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysQuarry @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA üíîüòî how is this even a thing üòî

I can't believe I am reading tweets like this! Is this really happening to people? Clean air is a human right and these people should not have to fight for it. They should be able to get on with their lives. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/wbPueG2VsP

@HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe How big of an Ego does he have when he knows this is what he is causing you all? He talks the talk but hides when confronted like a coward. üò†

I also want this to be raised with the @RedIndustries2 @WalleysQuarry Which ‚Äòdeodorisers‚Äô are being used in our air? Are they environmentally friendly or is it just more chemicals & pollution? @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/8s6xy673Ux

@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysQuarry @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA I have a dentist appointment down here tomorrow. You would think I would be scared of going to the dentist but no, I'm more worried of having a whiff of extremely dangerous levels of hydrogen sulphide. #StopTheStink

@CaseyMooBear @HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe If he ever showed his punchable face there would a queue a mile long to punch him . Sorry he makes my blood boil .

@JaneCahane @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding What's your issue with HS2? Genuine question.

@CaseyMooBear @HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe There was a post on here a week or two ago about him being proud of what red had achieved .

@HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe I've seen a video of the little boy fighting to breathe and I was in tears. No child should have to have fresh air taken from them. 

I've seen a photo of Share and he looks a right sleaze. That "my wealth before your health" kind of look. The scumbag.

Three months ago @EnvAgency began receiving thousands of complaints about #AirPollution from Whalley's quarry landfill. They checked for odour last weekend. Found it. And yet today the landfill started taking waste again. When will you take action? #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/EbNfU5Bq8y
4.6 miles tonight  @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off your action needs actioning!!! NOW where next will the heap of eternal stench travel????? üí®üí®üí®üí®ü§Æü§Æü§Æ

@poppers82 @HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @adamsharered @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off Paul, I sometimes get stingy eyes (which I never had before). entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

urls.title: | Environment Agency Board Member
urls.description: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs Environment, Food & Rural Affairs D irector of Floods and Water, Defra ‚Ä¢ Departmental Official Chair, Environment Agency ‚Ä¢ Representative of Organisation Chair, Highways England ‚Ä¢ Independent Member ‚Ä¢ sets the strategy, drives performance and holds the organisation to account; ‚Ä¢ provides stewardship for public funds and environmental outcomes. The Board is made up of a Chair, Chief Executive and up to 14 other members. The Board has a collegiate style. It
